subject: Pedal order no confirmation
description_text:
Hi there,

My son placed an order on Christmas Day, and has not received an order
confirmation as he had some confusion as to what email was used. I have
attached the transaction from his account, can you please send details?

Many thanks,

Lisa Baker, son name is Lachlan Baker. Western Australia

conversations.body_text: Our address is 41 Elvire Street Watermans Bay WA 6020. He is quite stressed as he used his Christmas Present money to purchase but in his excitement has made an error
Hi Lisa Baker,  No need to worry, we are currently checking the order. Generally, successfully placed orders are shipped in sequence.
Hi Lisa Baker,     Your order has been shipped. The order number is SSN5265, and below is the tracking information.

Thankyou.
Can you please re send the order confirmation to this email address and the
tracking link we need to follow?
Thankyou!


On Tue, 30 Dec 2025 at 4:15 pm, service@simsonn.com
Hi Lisa Baker,  This system cannot resend emails. You can track the shipment directly using the tracking number. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by email.
